name: MaFl_PetTamer
oralText: Raising your own pet takes patience and dedication. Are you ready?
introText: Rawr! Tee hee! ^^ Sorry, I was just practicing my tiger call. Do you have a pet? I love pets, it's what I live for!
byeText: Don't forget to feed your pet!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: I come from a long line of Pet Tamers. My family has been taming pets for generations and I am the best Pet tamer among them. Feel free to visit me if you hever need help with your pet.

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: Don't forget to feed your pet!
